help: It navigates to a given url when the browser is already open.
Equivalent to pressing back button in browser.
This text will appear in report only; not the screenshot file name.
Headless Playwright only. Saves the current webpage as pdf.
When button click triggers a new tab, use this step to switch to the new tab.
Will switch current tab and move to the previous tab.
Will return true only if status code is 200 and has content length more than 0.
Checks the page against accessibility guidelines.

step: |For request |**/users/2| use mock status |200| and response |{}|
help: Ensure "use mock" is enabled in setup. Works only with Playwright. Will use the mock response for the requests matching url pattern.
The file has to physically exist on the execution environment.
Will work for both text and locator.
This will click on first element which has this text or locator.
If you have more than one element with similar text/locator, you can specify which one to click.
You can click text/locator relative to another text/locator. Use right/left/above/below/near as direction.
The text for the icon can be found in the HTML aria-label/title/alt/class/id/href attribute.
The text for the icon can be found in the HTML aria-label/title/alt/class/id/href attribute. The icon can be either on right or left side.
Use it when you are expecting either of the two texts. Use double comma separated values.
You have to click the intended locator before using this method.
Presses keyboard keys.
This will type the value wherever the cursor is. This should ideally follow after a click to activate an input element.
This should ideally be either existing input value or placeholder text.
This would look for an element with partial text in the input box.
Use this if you have more than one input elements. The order is as determined by Playwright.
You can use double comma separated values for multiple checkboxes.
You can use double comma separated values for multiple checkboxes.
Gets value from a table.
Clicks value in a table.
Use this when column contains multiple items.
A good example is navigating to a specific month in a calendar.
Types a value in a table.
You can use text or locator.
You can use text or locator.

step: |Wait until one of the |successfully,,error | is displayed|
help: You can use text or locator. Have the values separated by double comma.
Use double comma separated values.

step: |Check text |some text| is present in webpage|

help: you can use text or locator. You can use either locator or partial text value.

step: |$value=| Get text from |td| to the |right| of |John Doe|
help: This is to get the next column text. It can also be used to get the full text from the right of another text.

step: |$value=| Click |Some text| and get alert text |
|Click |Some text| and accept alert if present|
